description:
The members ponder the question of why students always have access to the school roof in anime. And can they go up on their own school`s roof? Later at the club, they dissect high school broadcasting clubs and try thinking of new wrinkles to such a club. They also create a compelling potential manga/anime story centering around a broadcasting club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Like You When You`re Sad
Kana Shindeiru Toki no Anata ga Suki
悲しんでいる時のあなたが好き
